verses.t: After{G3326} this{G5023} I looked{G1492}, and{G2532}, behold{G2400}, a door{G2374} was opened{G455} in{G1722} heaven{G3588}: and{G2532} the first{G4413} voice{G3588} which{G3739} I heard{G191} was as it were{G5613} of a trumpet{G4536} talking{G2980} with{G3326} me{G1700}; which said{G3004}, Come up{G305} hither{G5602}, and{G2532} I will shew{G1166} thee{G4671} things{G5023} which{G3739} must{G1163} be{G1096} hereafter{G3326}.

And{G2532} immediately{G2112} I was{G1096} in{G1722} the spirit{G4151}: and{G2532}, behold{G2400}, a throne{G2362} was set{G2749} in{G1722} heaven{G3588}, and{G2532} one sat{G2521} on{G1909} the throne{G3588}.

And{G2532} he{G3588} that sat{G2521} was{G2258} to look upon{G3706} like{G3664} a jasper{G2393} and{G2532} a sardine{G4555} stone{G3037}: and{G2532} there was a rainbow{G2463} round about{G2943} the throne{G3588}, in sight{G3706} like unto{G3664} an emerald{G4664}.

And{G2532} round about{G2943} the throne{G3588} were four{G5064} and{G2532} twenty{G1501} seats{G2362}: and{G2532} upon{G1909} the seats{G3588} I saw{G1492} four{G5064} and{G2532} twenty{G1501} elders{G4245} sitting{G2521}, clothed{G4016} in{G1722} white{G3022} raiment{G2440}; and{G2532} they had{G2192} on{G1909} their{G846} heads{G3588} crowns{G4735} of gold{G5552}.

And{G2532} out of{G1537} the throne{G3588} proceeded{G1607} lightnings{G796} and{G2532} thunderings{G1027} and{G2532} voices{G5456}: and{G2532} seven{G2033} lamps{G2985} of fire{G4442} burning{G2545} before{G1799} the throne{G3588}, which{G3739} are{G1526} the seven{G2033} Spirits{G4151} of God{G3588}.

And{G2532} before{G1799} the throne{G3588} there was a sea{G2281} of glass{G5193} like unto{G3664} crystal{G2930}: and{G2532} in{G1722} the midst{G3319} of the throne{G3588}, and{G2532} round about{G2945} the throne{G3588}, were four{G5064} beasts{G2226} full of{G1073} eyes{G3788} before{G1715} and{G2532} behind{G3693}.

And{G2532} the first{G4413} beast{G3588} was like{G3664} a lion{G3023}, and{G2532} the second{G1208} beast{G2226} like{G3664} a calf{G3448}, and{G2532} the third{G5154} beast{G2226} had{G2192} a face{G3588} as{G5613} a man{G444}, and{G2532} the fourth{G5067} beast{G2226} was like{G3664} a flying{G4072} eagle{G105}.

And{G2532} the four{G5064} beasts{G2226} had{G2192} each{G303} of them{G1438} six{G1803} wings{G4420} about{G2943} him; and{G2532} they were full{G1073} of eyes{G3788} within{G2081}: and{G2532} they rest{G372} not{G3756} day{G2250} and{G2532} night{G3571}, saying{G3004}, Holy{G40}, holy{G40}, holy{G40}, Lord{G2962} God{G3588} Almighty{G3588}, which{G3588} was{G2258}, and{G2532} is{G5607}, and{G2532} is to come{G2064}.

And{G2532} when{G3752} those{G3588} beasts{G2226} give{G1325} glory{G1391} and{G2532} honour{G5092} and{G2532} thanks{G2169} to him{G3588} that sat{G2521} on{G1909} the throne{G3588}, who{G3588} liveth{G2198} for{G1519} ever{G3588} and ever{G3588},

The four{G5064} and{G2532} twenty{G1501} elders{G4245} fall down{G4098} before{G1799} him{G3588} that sat{G2521} on{G1909} the throne{G3588}, and{G2532} worship{G4352} him{G3588} that liveth{G2198} for{G1519} ever{G3588} and ever{G3588}, and{G2532} cast{G906} their{G846} crowns{G3588} before{G1799} the throne{G3588}, saying{G3004},

Thou art{G1488} worthy{G514}, O Lord{G2962}, to receive{G2983} glory{G3588} and{G2532} honour{G3588} and{G2532} power{G3588}: for{G3754} thou{G4771} hast created{G2936} all things{G3956}, and{G2532} for{G1223} thy{G4675} pleasure{G3588} they are{G1526} and{G2532} were created{G2936}.
